attributes.action: Lets get the law changed so that people living with Down Syndrome has the same equal rights as any body else!!
attributes.additional_details:
We would like to see a change in law were people living with Down Syndrome are given the same equal rights as to everybody else.
People with Down Syndrome seem to be ever fighting for what most people take for granted. Medical care, the right to a transplants, help with living cost and mobility, as well as education. People with Down Syndrome are not second class citizens, they are equal to us all.
